name: Party Killer
description:
🎧 One of you is a DJ throwing the party of the year. The other is a policeman who is trying to kill the party. Who will win? 🎧

IMPORTANT: This game is meant to be played by TWO people using CONTROLLERS.

Controls
X or A to join game.
Left Thumbstick to move.
Right Thumbstick to aim.
R1 to shoot.

Tools used
- Unity 2019.3
- Photoshop CC
- Bosca Ceoil
- Leshy SFMaker

We will be making a video about the creation of the game and sharing it on our YouTube Channel... Stay tuned!

Created by Asbjørn Thirslund from Brackeys.
